item.description:
* NEW INFORMATION, PLEASE TAKE NOTICE *
LOCATION IS "THE SHANGHAI CAFE"
KARAOKE LOUNGE IS ON THE 2ND FLOOR
START TIME IS 8:00PM
ENGLISH/CHINESE KARAOKE SELECTIONS
************************************

Note: The $10.00 Event Fee is to cover Shanghai
Cafe's minimum cover that can be used towards
drinks. There is no additional cost.

Come join us for a fun evening of Karaoke!

Boston Karaoke Meetup is growing very nicely. As of this today, we have 112 members who have signed up. More than 40 people have sang with us at one of our Karaoke Meetup Parties.

What are you waiting for, it's time to jump in and get involved. How you participate is entirely up to you, there is no pressure to sing before you are ready. Sign up today so you can:

- sing a nice solo tune or two
- sing in a duet with a fellow member
- just enjoy listening to others sing their favorite songs
- sing-a-long with everyone else on a well-known tune

As a treat, we will vote for the best performance of the evening and the winner will get free admission to our next Karoke Meetup.

Please sign up today, so I know how many people are coming. RSVP by December 14th.

See you there.

- Phil
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup Party - Dec. 16, 2006
